name: HCVRIBATest
title: HCV RIBA Test
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Laboratory Tests.),(Data Element Scope: Hepatitis C virus antibody test using Immunoblotting (IB) method.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hepatitis C virus antibody test performed using immunoblotting laboratory method and on serum/plasma specimen.),(Exclusion Criteria: Hepatitis C virus antibody test performed using any method other than immunoblotting laboratory method and on any specimen other than serum/plasma specimen.)
